text: "It Was a Good Day" is a 1993 single by American rapper Ice Cube. It was released from the album The Predator. "It Was a Good Day" peaked at number seven on the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs and number fifteen on the Billboard Hot 100. The song also peaked at number twenty-seven on the UK Singles Chart. ==Track listing== UK single # "It Was a Good Day" (radio edit) # "It Was a Good Day" (instrumental) ==References== Category:1993 songs
title: It Was a Good Day
